profile.name: Barath Elumalai
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with 4.5+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance systems using Java, Spring Boot, and microservice architecture. Skilled in API development, cloud integration (AWS), and event-driven solutions with Kafka, along with hands-on expertise in PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and Elasticsearch. I have worked on projects involving client requirement analysis, solution delivery, and business process support, which strengthened my domain knowledge, problem-solving, collaboration, and communication skills. Always eager to learn new technologies and contribute effectively to organizational success.
